jobDesc: Led the backend architecture design and technical decisions for multiple games and platform products, covering real-time systems, asynchronous processes, and high-concurrency scenarios, operating in a highly dynamic business environment.
Specialized in Node.js / TypeScript backend service construction, with knowledge of MySQL performance optimization and Redis application.

Evaluated risks, performance, and scalability from the architectural level, quickly identified bottlenecks, and proposed improvement plans, including asynchronous processing, resource allocation, and system load optimization.
Familiar with using logs, metrics, and behavioral data for system observation and issue positioning.
Introduced design review, code review, and release checklists to influence team technical decisions, establish implementation standards, and improve system stability.
Participated in the development and operation of multiple backend systems, including games, lotteries, blockchain fair random numbers, crawler data, and dashboard systems.
Responsible for system analysis, backend function implementation, code refactoring, and performance optimization.
Proactively participated in requirement planning, assisting in collecting business logic and technical implementation methods.
Provided API documentation, Postman examples, and key technical documentation to improve cross-team collaboration efficiency.
Development style emphasizes clear structure, scalability, and maintainability.

Participated in and delivered multiple business system projects, covering lending systems, video streaming platforms, equipment repair systems, and e-commerce modules, supporting actual operational needs.
Responsible for backend core function development and data flow design (Node.js / NestJS / MySQL) in the lending system, ensuring transaction process stability and data correctness.

Participated in frontend-backend integration and system architecture planning in the video streaming platform project, and was responsible for automated deployment processes to improve delivery efficiency.

Reduced coupling between modules and improved system maintainability through frontend-backend responsibility splitting and API design optimization. Assisted in establishing basic testing and verification processes (unit testing / functional testing) to reduce regression error rates.
Worked closely with product and business units to translate requirements into concrete executable technical solutions, ensuring projects were delivered on time.

Maintained stable delivery in scenarios with multiple parallel projects, accumulated cross-domain system development experience, and laid the technical foundation for subsequent platform and game systems.
